item.title: Build blob trigger and storage queue for microservice
item.description: In my last blog(here), I have demonstrated how to set up a Blob trigger uing the Microsoft Azure native product: Azure function to handle the events/updates. but instead of creating an Azure funtion in cloud, we want an on-premise application, or a microservice with the tigger function embeded. Solution 2: using RESTful API conncets Azure Storage Account. Architecture: Steps: prerequisites create resouce group -> Storage account create Storage queue for storing the messages(events)
